trans-unit.target: 將序列化<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"> </xref> xaml 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: VisualBasicSettingsValueSerializer facilitates the serialization of Visual Basic expressions to XAML.
trans-unit.target: VisualBasicSettingsValueSerializer 有助於序列化為 XAML 的 Visual Basic 運算式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsValueSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.XamlIntegration.VisualBasicSettingsValueSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted into a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref>執行個體都可以轉換成<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When called, this method promotes the specified <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings> instance to namespace declarations and adds them to the serialization context.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫時，會升級指定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings>命名空間宣告執行個體，並將它們加入至序列化內容。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings>

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance can be converted into a <xref:System.String>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref>執行個體都可以轉換成<xref:System.String>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance into a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的轉換<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref>至<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicSettings"></xref> instance.
